definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

pinyin: dan1 he2 xi4 bao1 zeng1 duo1 zheng4

sentences.english: Conclusion Tibetan compound prescription of XD shows certain therapeutic and preventive effect on plateau erythrocythemia.
sentences.chinese: 藏藥新三果湯對高原紅細胞增多症有一定的防治作用。

sentences.english: For example, many medical workers are convinced that the number of emergency cases increases during a full moon.
sentences.chinese: 例如，許多醫務工作者相信月圓時急診病例會增多。

sentences.english: Fourth, the urination barrier partner leucorrhea increases.
The papers of ideological trend about modern literature are increasing now.
sentences.chinese: 目前在現代文學方面研究文學思潮的文章逐步增多。

sentences.english: Instead, it was the number of de-escalating gestures that grew.
sentences.chinese: 相反卻是降級姿態在增多。

sentences.english: We now have more public opinion exerting pressure on politics than ever before.
sentences.chinese: 現在對政治施加壓力的公衆輿論比以前增多了。

sentences.english: Routine laboratory tests frequently indicate a relative lymphocytosis in uncomplicated parotitis.
sentences.chinese: 實驗室常規檢查常顯示淋巴細胞相對增多。

sentences.english: With more and more frequent international contact, more and more Chinese are learning English.
sentences.chinese: 隨着國際交往日益頻繁，中國人學外語的也日漸增多。

sentences.english: Alcohol consumption is linked to both higher homicide rates and more vehicle accidents.
sentences.chinese: 酒精消耗和殺人案件及交通事故增多都有聯繫。

sentences.english: Objeective To summarize the clinical of infectious mononucleosis(IM) in adult patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析傳染性單核細胞增多症的臨牀特徵及治療。

sentences.english: The number of project staff residing in Huiyang, Aotou and Daya Bay will also rise.
sentences.chinese: 居住在惠陽和大亞灣的項目員工也會增多。

sentences.english: Nowadays, in order to save land, underground projects gradually increase.
sentences.chinese: 現階段，爲了節約土地，地下工程逐漸增多。

sentences.english: Cases of kidnaping are gradually rising during recent years, especially in the southeast coast area.
sentences.chinese: 近幾年來，綁架勒贖案件增多，危害日益嚴重。

sentences.english: The number of protein body was increasing with reducing of starch grains in scutellar development late stage.
sentences.chinese: 盾片發育後期，澱粉粒逐漸減少，蛋白質體增多。

sentences.english: No natural pollen can grow on account of inadequate summer rainfall.
sentences.chinese: 因夏季雨水不足，自然花粉無法增多。

sentences.english: Eosinophils can increase with allergic reactions and with parasitic infestations.
sentences.chinese: 當過敏反應和寄生蟲感染時嗜酸性粒細胞會增多。

definition: to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
to decline/to drop/to fall/to go down/to decrease
year after year/with each passing year/over the years
(increasing) day by day/(more critical) with every passing day/gradually
day by day/more and more/increasingly/more and more with each passing day
